Title: Repeals subdivision 1-a of section 491 and subdivision (a-1) of section 499 of the tax law relating to requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance to cooperate with certain investigations
Summary: Repeals provisions of the tax law relating to requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance to cooperate with investigations by certain committees of the United States Congress under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Rpld ยง491 sub 1-a, ยง99 sub (a-1), Tax L (as proposed in S.5072-A & A.7194-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 1-a of section 491 and subdivision (a-1) of section 499 of the tax law relating to requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance to cooperate with investigations by certain committees of the United States Congress under certain circumstances
